ContentText: 3.The File Download dialog box appears prompting you to run or save the download file.
5.The installation process starts. Click the Install button to accept the license terms and to continue with the installation.
6.Oracle has partnered with companies that offer various products. The installer may present you with option to install these programs when you install Java.
7.After ensuring that the desired programs are selected, click the Next button to continue the installation
8.A few brief dialogs confirm the last steps of the installation process; click Close on the last dialog. This will complete Java installation process
9.You may need to restart (close and re-open) your browser to enable the Java installation in your browser
10.Set Environment variables JAVA_HOME with the installation path of Java(eg:C:\Java) and PATH+=(eg:C:\Java\bin)
